Package gameLogic

Class AnimalLogic

java.lang.Object
gameLogic.AnimalLogic
public class AnimalLogic
extends java.lang.Object
Contains logic dictating the manipulation of animals and their attributes.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimalLogic

      public AnimalLogic​(GameInformation info)
      Constructor for AnimalLogic with parameters.
      Parameters:
      info - The GameInformation class containing the information about the current game.

  • Method Details

    • dailyDecrease

      public void dailyDecrease​(boolean happinessChange)
      Decreases each animal's health by a set amount. If the number of days until animal happiness decreases is zero, decrease happiness by a set amount too.
      Parameters:
      happinessChange - A boolean dictating whether happiness should decrease.

    • feedAnimals

      public void feedAnimals​(ItemForAnimal feedItem, int animalIndex)
      Allows the user to feed an animal on their farm. Counts as a daily action, and as such can't be performed if all actions are completed.
      Parameters:
      feedItem - The ItemForAnimal that will be used to increase the animal's health.
      animalIndex - The index of the animal within the list that the user wishes to feed.

    • playWithAnimals

      public void playWithAnimals​(int animalIndex)
      Play with animals, increases the happiness of an animal in the farm.
      Parameters:
      animalIndex - Takes the integer of the position in the arrayList to get the animal.

    • calculateBonusScore

      public void calculateBonusScore()
      Method that is run at the end of each day. Calculates the total bonus score generated today by all of the farm's animals.
